summary: "Smells Like Teen Spirit" is a super popular song by Nirvana, a rock band from America. It came out in 1991 and became a huge hit, making their album Nevermind very famous. The song is about teenage feelings and rebellion, and its music video shows a crazy high school event. Many people think it's one of the best songs ever, winning lots of awards and appearing on important music lists. It even changed how MTV looked and felt!
title: Smells Like Teen Spirit
